item.title: 2d arrays.(At least that's what I believe it is...)
item.dc:creator: @ravekitty ravekitty
item.description:
@ravekitty wrote:

Basically.
I’m trying add RANDOM dialogue for every npc in game using a for method and a 2d string array.
and I was wondering how im supposed to do this part…
in actionhandler

for(int i = 0; i < 10000; i++) { if(npcType == i) { sendNpcChat2(c.getChat().Chat[][], "", c.talkingNpc, ""); } }
I want it to send TWO lines of dialogue.

Read full topic
